meanings.definition: A person who engages in noisy, boisterous behavior, especially while drinking alcohol.
meanings.sent1: The roisterers at the party were laughing loudly and dancing.
meanings.sent2: The group of roisterers in the bar were causing a commotion.
meanings.sent3: The roisterers decided to have a karaoke contest after a few drinks.
meanings.sent4: The roisterers were like a whirlwind of energy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The image of the roisterers singing and cheering was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To engage in noisy, boisterous behavior, especially while drinking alcohol.
meanings.sent1: Let's roisterers together at the celebration tonight!
meanings.sent2: They always roisterers loudly whenever they have a party.
meanings.sent3: The friends roisterers until the early hours of the morning.
meanings.sent4: The laughter and music roisterers through the night.
meanings.sent5: The group decided to roisterers to celebrate their success.
